title: House Speaker Ryan says assured Trump won't fire Mueller
text: March 20, 2018 / 2:37 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago House Speaker Ryan says assured Trump won't fire Mueller   on Tuesday said he has been assured that fellow Republican President Donald Trump is not considering firing U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller. FILE PHOTO: Special Counsel Robert Mueller leaves the U.S. Capitol Building after meeting with members of the Senate Judiciary Committee   June 21, 2017. REUTERS/Aaron P. Bernstein “The special counsel should be free to follow through his investigation to completion without interference, absolutely,” Ryan said at a news conference. “I am confident that he’ll be able to do that. I’ve received assurances that his firing is not even under consideration.” Ryan, who has supported the special counsel probe of Russian election meddling, did not elaborate on the assurances.
